src:
Man of the Match Barcelona vs Slavia Praha: Ondrej Kolar
06 Nov 2019, 05:31 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Ondrej Kolar terpilih menjadi pemain terbaik alias man of the match dalam laga matchday keempat fase grup Liga Champions 2019-20 antara Barcelona vs Slavia Praha, Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB.
Kolar tampil gemilang hampir sepanjang pertandingan untuk menjaga gawangnya agar tetap aman dari serangan yang dibangun oleh Lionel Messi cs.
Berkat hasil ini, Barcelona masih bertengger di puncak klasemen Grup F dengan poin 8, sedangkan Slavia Praha masih terpuruk di dasar klasemen dengan perolehan dua poin.
text:
Man of the Match Barcelona vs Slavic Prague: Ondrej Kolar
Nov 6, 2019, 05:31 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Ondrej Kolar was chosen as the best player alias man of the match in the fourth matchday match of the 2019-20 Champions League group phase between Barcelona vs Slavia Prague, Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hrs.
Kolar performed brilliantly for most of the match to keep his goal safe from the attacks built by Lionel Messi et al.
Thanks to these results, Barcelona still tops the Group F standings with 8 points, while Slavia Prague is still slumped at the bottom of the standings with two points.
